head.title: Read & Extract Metadata of {{FileFormatUp}} Files in {{ProgLang}} Applications
head.description: Cross platform {{ProgLang}} metadata management API to read and extract metadata information of {{FileFormatUp}} files. Work with metadata standards XMP, EXIF, IPTC, ID3 etc.

header.title: Extract Metadata From {{FileFormatUp}} File In {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Read & Extract metadata information from a wide range of documents, images, audio & video formats using GroupDocs.Metadata for {{EnvName}}
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About{{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers an advanced set of metadata management and manipulation features, allowing developers to easily read, edit, remove, search, compare, replace and export metadata information from images and document formats without using any external software. Extract metadata details from PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Visio, Project, AutoCAD, Archive and Multimedia file formats, and perform supported metadata operations with true flexibility.

formats.title: Metadata Extraction Live Demos
formats.description: Retrieve metadata information of {{FileFormatUp}} file right now by visiting [{{TextLiveDemos}}]({{LinkLiveDemos}}) website. The live demo has the following benefits.

examples.comment_1: Extract {{FileFormatUp}} metadata properties by various criteria
examples.comment_3: extract all metadata properties that fall into a particular category
examples.comment_4: iterate over all properties and display
examples.comment_5: extract all properties having a specific type and value
examples.comment_6: display all datetime properties with the year value equal to the current year
examples.comment_7: extract all properties having names matching the specified regex
examples.comment_8: display properties whose names match the following pattern

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to extract to read and extract metadata information from {{FileFormatUp}} files from within their applications by implementing a few easy steps.
content.step_1: Load the {{FileFormatUp}} with an instance of {{EnvName}} class.
content.step_2: Make up a predicate to examine all metadata properties.
content.step_3: Pass the predicate to the {{TextFindProperties}} method.

more_features.title: Search Files Metadata with {{ProdShortName}}
more_features.description: Securely manage hidden metadata within sensitive documents using {{EnvName}} applications powered by the {{ProdShortName}} library.

feature_1.title: {{EnvName}} Tools for Comprehensive Metadata Search
feature_1.content: Streamline your document processing in {{EnvName}} with {{ProdShortName}}. Our software offers powerful tools to search for and manage hidden metadata efficiently.

feature_2.title: Precise Metadata Targeting
feature_2.content: Target specific metadata with pinpoint accuracy. Configure your search with various filters like text, date, or regular expressions to find exactly the metadata you need.

feature_3.title: Effortless Metadata Management
feature_3.content: Leverage {{EnvName}} to process the values of discovered metadata entries. {{ProdShortName}} empowers you to add, update, or remove metadata effectively within supported file formats.

code_1.title: Read E-Book Metadata in {{ProgLang}}

code_1.comment_3: Use the retrieved data for your application's needs
